## Usage

To use this template in your Quarto document, specify `format: ipa-typst-typst` in your YAML front matter:

```yaml
---
title: "Your Document Title"
author: "Your Name"
format: ipa-typst-typst
---
```

Then render with:

```bash
quarto render your-document.qmd --to ipa-typst-typst
```
